channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft -- Windows 10
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft -- Windows 10

item.title: CVE-2019-0547|2024-08-04T17:51:26.839Z -- microsoft -- windows%2010
item.description: A memory corruption vulnerability exists in the Windows DHCP client when an attacker sends specially crafted DHCP responses to a client, aka "Windows DHCP Client Remote Code Execution Vulnerability." This affects Windows 10, Windows 10 Servers.
